tags: i’m going to end up deleting this
summary:
A Jonerys Drabble
She’s ogling. She knows she should look away before he sees her, but really, at this point, why even bother?...
body:
A Jonerys Drabble

She’s ogling. She knows she should look away before he sees her, but really, at this point, why even bother? She is trying, really, but when the live show of her nightly fantasies is unfolding right in front of her, she can’t help but give in to the intense need to stare.

Just as she hardens her resolve to carry on with her task, the greatest thing that could happen, does, and Daenerys thanks all the Gods she doesn’t believe in for the small miracle. The shirt comes off. Correction, the soaked shirt comes off and is dropped to the floor in an undignified slop, showcasing the damp body underneath. And what a body it is.

Jon Snow has been sculpted by the gods, Daenerys is sure of it. His chiseled abs on their own are enough to catch her breath, but when he turns slightly and bends over to pick up some paper towels, Dany has to remind herself to breathe. The rippling muscles of his back are returning her stare, calling out to her, taunting her to run her hands over the smooth milky skin; to dig in her nails in a way she expects he would relish. And then, when she’s done mapping his torso, maybe she can make her way down to that delectable arse of his, give it a firm pinch, or better yet, a smack, before rubbing it better.

She really needs to desist from continuing this fantasy in earshot of him, before she loses it completely, and makes a fool of herself. The sudden thought of sinking her teeth into his delicious flesh causes her to let out quiet a groan. Catching herself, she gives her head a small shake to clear the fog of lust, before realising she is being watched. Her eyes snap up to meet Jon’s onyx gaze. Jon who happens to be shirtless. She averts her eyes, the burn she feels on her cheeks embarrassment mixed with arousal, and she can feel it slowly colouring her chest.

Giving herself a mental slap, and she reminds herself that she is a dragon. It’s passed time she took what she wants. Enough of this dancing around each other. Enough of feeling the ache he leaves in her after yet another flirtatious encounter. It’s time they did something about it. It’s time Dany did something about it. She meets his intense gaze, swallowing hard. Squaring her shoulders, she takes a few steps towards him, head tilting slightly, considering him.

“Need help finding another shirt Jon? I happen to know a few storage cupboards we can check.” The octave of her voice lowers as she finishes the question, and his eyes widen slightly. Dany has to suppress a snort. He’s a puppy under that hard body, no doubt, but the intense way he was staring a moment ago lets her know something else is present, something that bites and snaps in the most filthily satisfying way; something that wants to devour her whole.

A look of acceptance, then determination passes over his face, confidence seemingly found. With a renewed swagger, he closes the space between them and leans in, close enough for Dany to feel the heat of his body. “Now there’s an offer I can’t refuse.” He smirks as he gently grabs hold of her hips, bringing her body flush against his, not breaking eye contact. His mouth grazes her ear, and Dany has to bite down the whimper. “Lead the way love, I want to see how much messier you can make me.”

So, I’m not sure where this has come from, but it’s been written for a while, and seeing as I am trying to put myself out there a little more, I figured I should post it? This is the first time I am posting anything I have written, so be gentle with me please? I hope someone enjoys it, at least before I turn chicken and delete it.

HAPPY NEW YEAR JONERYS FAM!

blog.name: 247reader
blog.title: Life, Books, Cats.
blog.description:
Or, Fashion. Fandom. Shinies. 
Hi.  My name's Lou.  Welcome!  My major fandoms currently are Star Trek (mostly DS9 and TOS), ASoIaF (the thing I'm writing the most fanfic for at the moment), Legend of Korra, Steven Universe, Star Wars (always and always) and Guild Wars. 

I try to warn for triggers, and sometimes talk about my mental illnesses.

 Elsewhere, I draw, code dressup games, and write fic under the name Siamesa.

blog.name: oadara
blog.title: The Path to Oadara
blog.description: To go forward, I must go back and make some delicious lemon cakes.

body:
The Lannisters and the Starks almost destroyed House Targaryen. But when they both came asking Daenerys for help she lent them a hand.

More importantly she’s treated both Tyrion Lannister and Jon Snow with the type of respect they received very little of.

Our Queen is both wise and magnanimous.

blog.name: ohnin017spn
blog.title: Untitled
blog.description: I am Jen, 36, my favorite things are Marvel,  Supernatural, A Song of Ice and Fire and Game of Thrones, Vikings, Gotham, The Last Kingdom, Peaky Blinders, and many other things

summary: Just watched Hardhome (5x08) because hbo has been having a marathon. Holy shit! Even though I've seen it a dozen times before, I...
body:
Just watched Hardhome (5x08) because hbo has been having a marathon. Holy shit! Even though I’ve seen it a dozen times before, I still got tears in my eyes and it’s definitely still one of my favorite episodes. Especially because we don’t see what happened there in the books, we only get a few details from Melisandre’s vision, which isn’t much. Jon’s experience at Hardhome is so compelling and heartbreaking, but he’s a Stark so just like soldier on Lord Commander. He’s been trying his best to reconcile the Night’s Watch and the Free Folk, basically keeping everyone from slaughtering each other, when neither side really even wants anything (other than murder) to do with the other. Not to mention he just refused Stannis in being legitimized and inheriting Winterfell because he feels duty bound to fulfill his oath, yet being a Stark is the only thing he’s ever wanted. On top of all that he sees what is actually happening with the wights and oh fuck their as yet unnamed leader can just, raise them from the dead? We see him go through pretty much all the stages of grief amidst the battle, as well as the utter fuck me! moment of his sword being able to kill one of these things, so there’s hope maybe? All this shit and my dude is like not even 20 years old. Oh and he just held the love of his life while she died. I’m crying.

My favorite episodes and scenes seem to be battles with Jon, and that is probably at least in part due to Kit’s acting. I swear there was some point to this post other than fangirling but it’s gone now, so here’s this shitpost.

blog.name: reddragon1995
blog.title: Jonerys Snowstorm Of House Stargaryen
blog.description: HE LOVED HER AND SHE LOVED HIM

summary: All that is gold does not glitter,
body:
All that is gold does not glitter,

Not all those who wander are lost;

The old that is strong does not wither,

Deep roots are not reached by the frost.

From the ashes, a fire shall be woken,

A light from the shadows shall spring;

Renewed shall be blade that was broken,

The crownless again shall be king.
